name: Miniature Donkey
description: Small, friendly donkeys often kept as pets or working animals.

name: American Mammoth
description: One of the largest donkey breeds, used for farming and transportation.

name: Poitou Donkey
description: Rare breed known for its long, shaggy coat.

name: Andalusian Donkey
description: A Spanish breed known for its strength and endurance.
